entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Atikokan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:06 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Atikokan 10:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 March 2023
Temperature: -5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -11.0°C
Wind: ESE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with a few rain showers in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or a few rain showers ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
